ExampleDefinition.Title: Drag Axis to Scale
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates mouse-dragging of X and Y Axis to scale using the YAxisDragModifier and XAxisDragModifier. These are a built-in ChartModifierBase derived classes which add the behavior of scaling on mouse-drag of each axis.
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Drag Axis to Scale</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Showcases how to add Axis-Drag scaling to a SciChartSurface using the YAxisDragModifier and XAxisDragModifier.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">YAxisDragModifiers must be assigned to an axis. These can be used in Absolute mode (when YAxis.AutoRange=false) as well as Relative mode (when YAxis.AutoRange=true).</Run>
ExampleDefinition.HelpText: Left-Button Drag over the Axis to scale SciChart
